tut.eng: You can purchase global buff items here

canAccessError.trans: You need to be at least level 5 to access unit exchange
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 3 to access unit exchange

tut.trans: If you like the game, please consider donating :)
tut.eng: If you liked the game, please consider donation :)

canAccessError.trans: You need to be at least level 5 to access the cosmetic merchant
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 3 to access cosmetic merchant

tut.trans: You can use your acquired Caches to print new equipment here
tut.eng: You can use your Cache to print new equipment here

tut.trans:
To progress to the next area, you need to get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force a key for the next area
tut.eng:
To progress to the next area, you need to get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force the key for next area

description.trans: This is your personal computer. Although a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience
description.eng: Your personal computer, although it's a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience

canAccessError.trans: Musisz być przynajmniej 5, aby uzyskać dostęp do terminalu
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access terminal

canAccessError.trans: You need to be at least level 5 to access the bank
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access bank

description.trans: A workbench with the necessary tools, allowing you to tinker with your equipment.
description.eng: A workbench with the necessary tools allows you to tinker with your equipment.

canAccessError.trans: Musisz być przynajmniej 10, aby uzyskać dostęp do stacji kalibracyjnej
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access Calibration Station

description.trans: A family-run trading shop that lets you trade with scavenged goods.
description.eng: A family run trading shop that lets you trade with what they have found while scavenging

canAccessError.trans: Musisz być co najmniej 10, aby uzyskać dostęp do kupca
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access merchant

description.trans: Fully-automated recycler, capable of recycling items to their basic scrap form
description.eng: Fully automated recycler, capable of recycling items to their basic scrap form

description.trans:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities on the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.
description.eng:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities in the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.

name.trans: Go to Hyper Train Central Station
name.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: Rozpocznij przygodę na Epic Loot tutaj
tut.eng: Start your adventure for epic loot here

description.trans: Idź do Hyper Train Central Station
description.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: Możesz wypełnić zadania AFK, aby zwiększyć swoje umiejętności tutaj
tut.eng: You can complete AFK jobs to increase your skills here

tut.trans: Możesz sprzedawać lub kupować przedmioty z innych graczy tutaj
tut.eng: You can sell or buy items from other players here

description.trans:
[Job Hub]
        Where many shops and businesses reside. It is the perfect location to try out your skills.
description.eng:
[Job Hub]
        Here are many shops and businesses reside. The perfect location to hone and refine your skills.

description.trans:
[Player Market]
        The famous street market in Shangri-La where loads of stalls fill the street.
        Maybe you can find something you need or set up shop yourself.
description.eng:
[Player Market]
        The famous market street in Shangri-La. Loads of market stalls fill the street.
        Maybe you can find something you need or set up shop yourself.

description.trans:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at super speed across the continent with ease.
description.eng:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at supersonic speed across the continent with ease.

description.trans: Wróć do ${mainHubName}
description.eng: Return to ${mainHubName}

description.trans: Wróć do ${segmentStationName}
description.eng: return to ${segmentStationName}

description.trans: Wróć do stacji Hyper Train
description.eng: Return to Hyper Train Station

description.trans:
Gather all 3 unique Key Fragments from Dungeons in the previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area
description.eng:
Gather all 3 different Key Fragments from Dungeons in each 3 zones in previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area

tut.trans: Start with the level 1 to 10 area
Continue here to fight a level 1 enemy
tut.eng: Continue here to fight level 1 enemy

description.trans: Idź do ${zoneName}
description.eng: Go to ${zoneName}

description.trans: Poznaj ${segment} do ${segmentMaxLevel}
description.eng: Level ${segment} to ${segmentMaxLevel}

description.trans:
[Gang]
        The headquarters for you and your gang members to plan and execute the next operation
description.eng:
[Gang]
        The headquarters for you and your gang members to plan and execute your next operation

cantEnterError.trans: Musisz dołączyć do gangu, aby wejść do tego obszaru
cantEnterError.eng: You need to join a gang to enter this area

description.trans: A shard that contains someone's memories and experiences. If used, you may gain ${levelName} experience from this
description.eng: A shard that contains someone's memory and experience. If used you may gain ${levelName} experience from this

description.trans:
Secret key Fragment. Used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at City Center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal and challenge).
                                When you have acquired the 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) the key to the next area
description.eng:
A secret key Fragment used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at city center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge),
                                when you acquired 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) a key to the next area

description.trans:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing. 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of the item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and are useful to level up your Printing Rank
description.eng:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing, 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and useful to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans: Do you have a headache? Use Pain Away™ to relieve your pain!
description.eng: Do you have headache? Use Pain Away™ to relieve your pain!

description.trans: An old nano repair bot. Used to repair small tech devices.
description.eng: An old nano repair bot, usually used to repair small tech devices.

description.trans: An old nano medic bot. Inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!
description.eng: Old nano medic bot is used to cure any (*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: Inject it to cure any (*conditions apply) injury!
description.eng: Inject it to cure any(*conditions apply) injury!

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. Capable of patching injuries while in combat.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are used in the military. They are capable of patching injuries while in combat.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are for advanced military use. Capable of patching up injuries in combat situations.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that are for advanced military use. Capable of patching up injuries in combat situations.
description.eng: Injectable nano machines that are standard issue for military use. They're capable of patching injuries while in combat.

description.trans: Do you and your friends have headaches? Use Pain Away Spray™ to relieve your pain!
description.eng: Do you and your friends both have headaches? Use Pain Away Spray™ to relief your pain!

description.trans: An old repair drone. Capable of repairing or healing nearby players.
description.eng: Old repair drone, capable of repairing or heal nearby players

description.trans: An old nano medic drone. Capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: Old nano drone, capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of military-grade nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of military nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players.
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Bits and pieces of used medical tech. Can be used to craft healing items.
description.eng: Bits and pieces of used medical tech. This can be used to craft healing items if you understand how

description.trans: Memory bank containing someone's memories. If used, you will gain experience from this.
description.eng: Memory bank contains someone's memory. If used you may gain experience from this

description.trans:
Can be used as dedicated hardware for Bitcoin mining. 
        However, due to overclocking, the processor will easily burn out.
        You may use this to mine Bitcoin at [JOB HUB]
description.eng:
Can be used as a dedicated hardware for BitCoin mining, 
        however due to overclocking, the processor is easily burntout,
        You may use this to mine BitCoin at [JOB HUB]

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically-connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors, thus allowing super-human mental capacity for a short period of time.
        
        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks at +5% speed for 10 minutes (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +5% speed for 10 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically-connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors, thus allowing super-human mental capacity for a short period of time.
        
        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks at +40% speed for 20 minutes (stackable x2)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +40% speed for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically-connected users, enhancing their Frontal Cortex integration with cyberwares installed, thus increasing the memory capability of the user.

        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, increasing EXP gained to 180% for 20 minutes
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, enhancing their Frontal Cortex integration with cyberwares installed, thus increasing memory capability of the user.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase EXP gained to 180% for 20 minutes

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically-connected users, augmenting their transaction algorithm temporarily, allowing user to receive bonus  ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME}.

        When used, gives a Global Buff to all players online, increasing Bitcoin gained by 40% for 20 minutes (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, argument their transaction algorithm temporary, allowing user to receive bonus  ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME}.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase BitCoin gained by 40% for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU) that comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a bot that farms dungeons for you.
description.eng:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU). Comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a farming bot to dungeon for you.

description.trans: A portable energy storage device. Can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons
description.eng: Portable energy storage device, it can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons

description.trans:
A high-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your Destructive Weapon.
description.eng:
High-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your destructive weapon.

description.trans:
Ammunition tech parts commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition.
description.eng:
Ammunition tech parts, These can be commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition if you understand how.

description.trans: Military-grade ammunition tech parts commonly used by the government, military, and the elite. Can be used to craft into ammunition.
description.eng: Military grade ammunition tech parts, commonly used by government, military and the elites,can be used to craft into usable Ammo if you have the know-how

description.trans:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment. This can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.
description.eng:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment, this can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.

description.trans:
A reinforced container with a biometric encryption lock. It seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on outdated firmware where an exploit is possible. Go to [Terminal] to unlock this container
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

description.trans:
A reinforced container with a biometric encryption lock. It seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on outdated firmware where an exploit is possible. Go to [Terminal] to unlock this container
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

description.trans:
A reinforced container with a biometric encryption lock. It seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on outdated firmware where an exploit is possible. Go to [Terminal] to unlock this container
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

description.trans:
A simple transmitter device that can be bound to your gang encrypted channel and give an invasion order.
        This item is required to activate Gang Dungeons
description.eng:
A simple transmitter device that can be bind to your gang encrypted channel and give out invasion order.
        This item is required to activate Gang Dungeons

description.trans:
Contains various items and resources for a gang to stay functional.
        Click use to send it to your gang headquarters.
description.eng:
Contains misc items and resources for a gang to stay functional,
        Click use to send it to your gang headquarters

description.trans:
A memory shard contains encrypted gang secrets. 
        Decrypt this in your gang headquarters to gain useful intel (requires user to be in a gang).
description.eng:
A memory shard contains encrypted gang secrets, 
        decrypt this in your gang headquarters to gain useful intel (requires to be in a gang)

description.trans: A black market memory shard contains highly encrypted algorithm and schematic that is crucial in the process of upgrading equipment.
description.eng: A black market memory shard contains highly encrypted algorithm and schematic that is crucial in the process of upgrading equipments

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipment.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 5% (stackable) for 5 minutes.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 5% (stackable) for 5 minutes.

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipment.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 10% (stackable) for 5 minutes.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 10% (stackable) for 5 minutes.

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipment.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advanced AI designed to assist with upgrading equipment.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 100% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 100% (stackable) for 5 minutes. This effect will apply to all players online

description.trans:
Experimental nano machines designed to reduce and negate the destructive effect when failing calibration, 
        when this is activated, all calibration fails will not destroy the item for 5 minutes
description.eng:
Experimental nano machines designed to reduces and negate the destructive effect when failing calibration, 
        when this is activated, all calibration fails will not destroy the item for 5 minutes

description.trans:
A forgotten ancient pouch. 
        There is a weird cartoon frog with a big mouth and red lips drawn on the side of it.
        The meaning of the ancient ominous drawing is unknown, but it is handy to keep some small objects in.
        Increases inventory space when equipped.
description.eng:
A forgotten ancient pouch, 
        there is a weird cartoon frog with big mouth and red lips drawing at the side of it,
        the meaning of the ancient ominous drawing is unknown, but it is handy for keep some small object in it.
        increase inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
Cool and fashionable Fanny Pack, signed by a legend called The Rock himself from decades ago.
        Increases inventory space when equipped.
description.eng:
Cool and fashionable Fanny Pack, signed by a legend called The Rock himself from decades ago.
        increase inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
A children's backpack known as the Purple 'Explorer' Backpack. It has a name tag with the previous owner's name "Dora" written on it. You look fabulous wearing it.
        Increases inventory space when equipped
description.eng:
An old Kindergarten looking Purple 'Explorer' Backpack, it has a name tag with the previous owner's name "Dora" written on it, you look fabulous wearing it.
        increase inventory space when equipped

description.trans:
A standard issue office case. It has a label in white print with "Arasaka" on it. 
        While it is spacious and has some high tech compartments and slots for document storage, it is not very suitable for carrying weapons
        Increases inventory space when equipped
description.eng:
An standard issue office case, it has a label with whit print with "Arasaka" on it, 
        while it is specious and has some high tech compartment and slots for document storage, it is not not very suitable for carrying weapons
        increase inventory space when equipped

description.trans:
A military used bot designed to carry your equipment and follow you autonomously
        with its six strong legs that imitate the movement of spiders and an advanced onboard AI. 
        It can follow you swiftly and quietly while it avoids getting in the way of whatever mission you are performing
description.eng:
An military used bot designed to carry your equipments and follows you autonomously,
        with it's six strong legs that imitates the movement of spiders and a advance onboard AI, 
        it can follow you swiftly and quietly while it avoids get in the way of whatever mission you are performing

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that is for advance military use. Capable of patching injury in combat situation
description.eng: injectable nano machines that is for advance military use, capable of patching injury in combat situation

description.trans: Injectable nano machines that is for advance military use. Capable of patching injury in combat situation
description.eng: injectable nano machines that is for advance military use, capable of patching injury in combat situation

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans: Capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players
description.eng: capable of dispatching thousands of advanced nano machines to heal nearby players

description.trans:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipment.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% for 5 minutes. This only affect yourself.
        You can calibrate items in your Gang Headquarter, you must join or start a gang first.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% for 5 minutes. this only affect yourself.
        You can calibrate items in your Gang Headquarters, you must join or start a gang first.

description.trans:
An exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to Pirate Speak. This effects all players for 10 minutes
description.eng:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to Pirate Speak. This effects all players for 10 minutes

description.trans:
An exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to l33t Sp34k. This effects all players for 10 minutes
description.eng:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to l33t Sp34k. This effects all players for 10 minutes

description.trans:
An expwoit moduwe that intewcepts gwobaw chat packages and modifies it, pewfowming man-in-the-middwe attack.
         twansfowms aww speech at gwobaw chat to uwu speak. This effects aww pwayews fow 10 minutes
description.eng:
A expwoit moduwe that intewcepts gwobaw chat packages and modifies it, pewfowming man-in-the-middwe attack.
         twansfowms aww speech at gwobaw chat to uwu speak. This effects aww pwayews fow 10 minutes

description.trans: A shard stores default settings and algorithm for equipment. This is used for factory-resetting your equipment
description.eng: A shard stores default settings and algorithm for equipments, this is used for factory-resetting your equipments

description.trans:
Po użyciu pomiń 60 minut na zadaniach AFK. 
         musi być używany na ekranie AFK
description.eng:
When used, skip 60 minutes on AFK tasks.
        must be used at AFK screen

description.trans:
You get some love, and you get some love! Everyone gets some love!.
        When used everyone loves each other
        This effects all players fow 10 minutes
description.eng:
You get some love, and you get some love! everyone gets some love!.
        When used everyone loves each other
        This effects all players fow 10 minutes

description.trans:
Worried Big Brother is spying on you while you browse the cyberspace?
        Does your intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks? 
        Use CyberTunnel VPN to protect and encrypt your netrunning experience! 
        
        Once activated, ignores any chat exploit for 1 hour
description.eng:
Worried the Big Brother spying on you while you browse the cyberspace?
        your intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks? 
        use CyberTunnel VPN to protect and encrypt your netrunning experience! 
        
        Once activated, ignores any chat exploit for 1 hour

description.trans:
Shard, który zawiera exploits. 
         Może być używany do naruszenia systemów, takich jak twierdza danych Shangri-La
description.eng:
A shard that contains advance exploits. 
        Can be used to breach systems such as Shangri-la Data Fortress

description.trans:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys an AI to clear dungeons for you. This will use up an AI Core; they usually only manage one trip.
description.eng:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys an AI to dungeon for you. This will use up an AI Core, they usually only just manage the one trip.

tut.trans: You can use your AI Cores to Auto-Farm enemies while you are AFK
tut.eng: You can use your AI Core to Auto-Farm enemies while you AFK

description.trans: Improve your Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, helping to increase the level of your prints.
description.eng: Improve Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, this may help to increase the level of your prints.

description.trans: Pobierz przydatne dane z lokalnej kliniki mod ciała do rzemiosła wyższej jakości botów medycznych i dronów.
description.eng: Download useful data from a local body mod clinic to craft higher quality medical bots and drones.

description.trans: Tinker with ammunition to find more effective ways of crafting it.
description.eng: Tinker with ammunition, to find more effective ways of crafting it.

description.trans:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Printing Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.
description.eng:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Print Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.

description.trans: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins. However, due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit - otherwise known as the QPU - will often burn out.
description.eng: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins, however due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit, otherwise known as the QPU, will often burn out.

description.trans:
[Rośnie zasobów AFK] 
                     Wyszukaj w ${zoneName} i ocenę do przydatnych przedmiotów. 
                     Kto wie, może będziesz mieć szczęście!
description.eng:
[AFK Resource Gather]
                    Search around in ${zoneName} and scavenge for useful items.
                    Who knows, maybe you'll get lucky!

description.trans: Pomóż zbierać i zarządzać potrzebnymi zasobami dla swojego gangu
description.eng: Help gather and manage needed resources for your gang

description.trans: Decrypt the memory shard you found to retrieve useful intel
description.eng: Decrypt a memory shard to retrieve useful intel.

description.trans: Pomóż wzmocnić i ustalić większą kontrolę nad Szangri-La City.
description.eng: Help reinforce and establish greater control of Shangri-la city.

description.trans:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play the MEGA Pachinko with the chance to win HUGE EPIC rewards!
        Only 10000 btc per session, LIMITED TIME OFFER!!! <3<3<3
        ##Special thanks for Militech for sponsoring this event##
description.eng:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play the MEGA Pachinko! With chance to win HUGE EPIC rewards
        only 5000 btc per session, LIMITED TIME OFFER!!! <3<3<3
        ##Special thanks for Militech for sponsoring this event##

description.trans: Bribe Government officials and SLPD and collect Protection Fees from business owners and citizens in Shangri-la. Maybe you will get some EPIC items from them? (Top Two Gang Exclusive)
description.eng: Bribe government officials and the SLPD to collect protection fees from business owners and citizens in Shangri-La. Maybe you’ll get some EPIC items from them? (Exclusive to the Top 2 Gangs on the Occupation Leaderboard

description.trans:
Launch a collaborated attack in cyberspace targeting the Shangri-La Data Fortress
        If attack is to succeed, it's possible to force the Data Fortress to transmit exploits to all cybernetically connected users
description.eng:
Launch a collaborative attack in cyberspace targeting the Shangri-La Data Fortress.
If the attack succeeds, it’s possible to force the Data Fortress to transmit exploits to all cybernetically connected users.

tut.trans:
Dive into a dungeon to get even more exp and loot!
                        Remember to buy some healing items! You don"t regen after battle in dungeons
tut.eng:
Are you ready? you can test your strength out with normal dungeon, the easiest one.
                        Remember to bring healing item! you won't heal after fights in dungeon

description.trans:
Zalecany poziom: ${maxLevel} + z kooperowaniem 
                     ${expMultiplier} x więcej exp! 
                     Wyzwanie Tryb Dungeon, dodatkowy łup i Exp. 
                     Drops ${keyFragmentDisplayName} 
                     Nie zaleca się wprowadzania, jeśli twój poziom jest zbyt niski
description.eng:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Challenge mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    Drops ${keyFragmentDisplayName}
                    Not advised to enter if your level is too low

tut.trans:
Are you strong enough? Try out a Challenge Dungeon.
                        There is a strong boss and tons of loot at the end waiting for you!
                        It's recommended to attempt this with other players.
tut.eng:
Are you strong enough? try it out on Challenge Dungeon,
                        there is a strong boss and tons of loot at the end waiting for you!
                        Its recommended to attempt this with other players.

description.trans:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Gang mode dungeon, extra loot and exp. 
                    Boss drops are rare+ 
                    Not advised to enter if your level is too low
description.eng:
Recommended Level:　${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${2.3}x more EXP! and 4~5x stronger enemies!
                    Gang mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    *Not for the faint of heart*

buttonTut.trans:
Myślisz, że jesteś wystarczająco silny? Weź silniejszych wrogów w Dungeon! 
                         Pamiętaj, aby kupić trochę uzdrowienia! Nie regenerujesz po bitwie w Dungeon
buttonTut.eng:
Do you think you are strong enough? take on stronger enemies in dungeon!
                        remember to buy some healing item! you won't regen after battle in dungeon

enemyInRoomDoorError.trans: Nie możesz używać drzwi, gdy wciąż jest wroga w pokoju
enemyInRoomDoorError.eng: You cannot use door while there is still enemy in room

enemyInCrateDoorError.trans: Szukanie jest zbyt niebezpieczne, gdy są w pobliżu wrogich wrogów
enemyInCrateDoorError.eng: It is too dangerous to search while there are still enemies nearby

progression.eng:
Acquire a Key Fragment from each dungeon located in ${segmentDisplayName}.
                These are used to create the key to the next zone.
                To craft the key, go to Terminal in [HUB]

description.trans:
Acquire a Key Fragment from each dungeon located in ${segmentDisplayName}.
                These are used to create the key to the next zone.
                To craft the key, go to Terminal in [HUB]
description.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]

description.trans: Zabij wrogów i uzyskać pełny zestaw przedmiotów, aby rozpocząć podróż
description.eng: Kill some enemies and get a full set of items for you to start your journey

description.trans:
Witamy w CyberCode Online, 
         Zaprzyjaźnienie się z ludźmi online będą bardzo przydatne, aby ukończyć zadania kooperacyjne, 
         Idź dalej Poproś ludzi online, jeśli masz jakieś pytania :) 
         Pamiętaj, że jeśli spamujesz na czacie, zostaniesz wyciszony przez moderatorów.
description.eng:
Welcome to CyberCode Online,
        making friends with people online will be very useful for you to complete co-op quests,
        go ahead ask people online if you have got any questions :)
        Remember, if you spam in the chat, you will be muted by moderators.

description.trans:
Poziom drukowania elementów z pamięci podwątniczych są określane przez rangę drukowania, 
         Wypoziomuj swoją rangę drukowania, dzięki czemu można wydrukować pozycje wyższego poziomu. 
        
         Możesz znaleźć molekularną drukarkę 3D w [Central Hub], użyj go do drukowania niektórych pamięci podręcznych, aby wyrównać rangę drukowania
description.eng:
The level of itemS you print with Caches are determined by your Printing Rank,
        level up your Printing Rank so you can print higher level items.
        
        You can find Molecular 3D Printer at [Central Hub], use it to print some caches to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans: Otwórz 4 skrzynie w Dungeon, aby uzyskać je słodkie łupki!
description.eng: Open 4 crates in dungeon to get them sweet loots!

abandonConfirm.trans: Czy jesteś pewien, że chcesz porzucić ten misję?
abandonConfirm.eng: Are you sure you want to abandon this quest?

description.trans: Możesz sprzedawać i kupować przedmioty z graczy na rynku gracza, wypróbuj go, dodając przedmiot do rynku gracza
description.eng: You can sell and purchase items from players in the player market, try it out by adding an item to the player market

watchAdRefresh.trans: Watch an AD to refresh quest
watchAdRefresh.eng: Watch an AD to refresh quest

hiddenNpcTip.trans: ${hiddenCount} Więcej interactables można odblokować w tej lokalizacji, na poziomie, aby je odblokować.
hiddenNpcTip.eng: ${hiddenCount} more interactables can be unlocked at this location, level up to unlock them.

travelHiddenLinks.eng: ${hiddenCount} more travel options can be unlocked

selectItemForSale.eng: Please select the item you want to sell

increaseSlotDescription.trans: Wydaj bitcoiny, aby zwiększyć liczbę przedmiotów w tym samym czasie
increaseSlotDescription.eng: Spend Bitcoins to increase how many items you can put in your stall at the same time

cantEnterError.trans: Musisz mieć przynajmniej poziom 4, aby uzyskać dostęp do rynku
cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level 4 to access the market

underlevelChatBlock.trans: Musisz mieć co najmniej poziom ${minLevel}, aby wysłać wiadomości czatu
underlevelChatBlock.eng: You need to be at least level ${minLevel} to send chat messages

spamBlock.trans: Nie wysyłaj bezsensownej wiadomości, spamy zostaną wyciszone.
spamBlock.eng: Please do not send meaningless message, spams will be muted.

repeatBlock.trans: Nie należy wielokrotnie wysyłać tej samej wiadomości, spamy zostaną wyciszone.
repeatBlock.eng: Please do not send the same message repeatedly, spams will be muted.

shortChatBlock.trans: Nie wysyłaj krótkich wiadomości, zamiast tego spróbuj już dłuższego zdania.
shortChatBlock.eng: Please do not send short messages, try a longer sentence instead.

placeholder.trans: Wpisz nazwę swojej postaci, aby usunąć
placeholder.eng: Enter your character name to delete

langWarning.trans: This language pack is open-source and contributed to by our players. The text may not be fully translated and may contain mistakes. Please feel free to edit and contribute from our Github page
langWarning.eng: This language pack is open source and contributed by our players, the text may not be fully translated and could contain mistakes. please feel free to edit and contribute from our Github page

restartRequired.trans: The app will restart after saving
restartRequired.eng: App will self restart after save

description.trans: Wyłączający pasek rozrządu ataku nie udzieli dodatkowych obrażeń
description.eng: Disabling attack timing bar will not grant extra damage

description.trans: Wyłącz, jeśli karta czatu opóźnia się podczas pomijania
description.eng: Disable if chat tab lags during skips

title.trans: Enter the system passcode to proceed

title.eng: Please enter amount you want to deposit

detail.trans: ${amount} bitcoin will be deposited into your gang account. This cannot be reversed
detail.eng: ${amount} bitcoin will be deposit into your gang account, this cannot be reversed

noClan.eng: No gang has occupied this area yet

title.trans: Czy na pewno chcesz opuścić ten loch?
title.eng: Are you sure you want to leave this dungeon?

subtitle.trans: Nie będziesz mógł ponownie wejść do tej instancji Dungeon
subtitle.eng: You will not be able to enter this dungeon instance again

selectEquipmentTitle.eng: Please select an item to calibrate

description.trans: Przedmioty zostaną automatycznie przeniesione do ekwipunku, gdy będziesz miał wystarczająco dużo miejsca.
description.eng: Items here will be automatically moved to your inventory once you have enough space.

empty.trans: Nie ma przedmiotu w skrzynce odbiorczej przedmiotu
empty.eng: There is no item in your item inbox

subTitle.trans: Gather caches from enemies and dungeons to print new weapons and armor
subTitle.eng: gather the caches from enemies and dungeons to print your new weapons and armor

selectDeposit.eng: How much would you like to deposit?

selectWithdraw.eng: How much would you like to withdraw?

selectDepositItem.eng: How many would you like to put in the vault?

selectWithdrawItem.trans: Ile chciałbyś wycofać się z banku?
selectWithdrawItem.eng: How many would you like to withdraw from the bank?

noBalance.trans: You can't withdraw without a balance.
noBalance.eng: You can't withdraw when you have no balance.

takeItemFromVaultDesc.eng: Take items out from your vault

upgradeSlotDesc.trans: Zwiększ maksymalną ilość przedmiotów, które możesz przechowywać w Vault do ${upgradeToSlot}
upgradeSlotDesc.eng: Increase the max amount of items you can store in vault to ${upgradeToSlot}

story.trans: You found an old locked safe box. There is a post-it with some text written on it.
story.eng: You found an old locked safe box, there seems like a post-it with some text written on it.

instruction.trans: This item is broken; bring it to the Weapon Smith for repair
instruction.eng: This item is broken, bring it to Weapon Smith for repair

areaEffect.trans: [Aoe] Obszar działania, efekt tego przedmiotu zastosuje sojuszników w walce z tobą.
areaEffect.eng: [AOE] Area of Effect, the effect of this item will apply allies in combat with you.

noKeysTitle.eng: You don't have any secret keys

noKeysSubtitle.trans: Możesz uzyskać tajne klucze z lochów
noKeysSubtitle.eng: You can obtain secret keys from Dungeons

notUnlocked.trans: This is not unlocked yet; try leveling up your character
notUnlocked.eng: This is not unlocked yet, try leveling up your character
You have not unlocked this area yet

confirmation.trans:
Dzięki temu zresetuje całą kalibrację przedmiotu. Znowu sprawi, że będzie już dostępny. 
       Na pewno chcesz kontynuować?
confirmation.eng:
Doing this will reset all calibration on your item. It will also make it tradable again. 
      Are you sure you want to proceed?

confirmKickMember.trans: Are you sure you want to kick this player from your gang?
confirmKickMember.eng: are you sure you want to kick this player from your gang?

description.trans: Jeśli masz kupon z jednego z naszych wydarzeń, możesz go tutaj zdobyć.
description.eng: If you have a coupon from one of our events, you can claim it here.

placeholder.trans: Wklej lub wpisz tutaj swój kupon
placeholder.eng: Paste or enter your coupon here

title.trans: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is irreversible and all account information will be removed.
title.eng: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is irreversible, all account information will be removed.

cantEnterError.trans: Musisz być co najmniej poziom 2, aby uzyskać dostęp do koncentratora pracy
cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level 2 to access the job hub

description1.trans: CyberCode Online is an online game. An account is needed to store game data.
description1.eng: CyberCode Online is an online game, an account is needed to store game data.

description2.trans: Please register or login with existing account
description2.eng: please register or login with existing account

emptyError.trans: Please enter your character name to continue.
emptyError.eng: Please enter your character name to continue.

description.trans: You will be muted if you use an offensive or inappropriate name.
description.eng: you will be muted if you use an offensive or inappropriate name.

description.trans: Sprawdź tylko, czy masz referator (opcjonalnie)
description.eng: Only check if you have a referer (Optional)

description.trans: Wyszukaj i wybierz Odtwarzacz, który Ci się zwał
description.eng: Please search and select the player who referred you

description.trans: Ustawiłeś ${name} jako twój referator
description.eng: You have set ${name} as your referer

description.trans: Nie możesz tego zmienić w przyszłości
description.eng: You cannot change this in the future

description.trans:
Global Skip allows you to skip the AFK waiting time and finish it instantly.
    This effect will be applied to all players performing an AFK task
description.eng:
Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all player performing AFK task

description.trans: Użyj jednego z ${timeSkipItemName}, aby pominąć ${itemSkipMinutes} minut
description.eng: Use one of your ${timeSkipItemName} to skip ${itemSkipMinutes} minutes

description.trans:
Global Skip allows you to skip the AFK waiting time and finish instantly.
    This effect will be applied to all other players performing AFK tasks
description.eng:
Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all players performing an AFK task

subtitle.trans: Global Skip pomija czas oczekiwania dla wszystkich graczy wykonujących zadanie AFK
subtitle.eng: Global Skip will skip the waiting time for all players performing AFK task

newbieTip.trans: Zadanie będzie kontynuowane, nawet jeśli zamkniesz grę
newbieTip.eng: The task will continue even if you close the game

abortWarning.trans: Przez przerwaniu tego wygrałeś, otrzymasz nagrodę, a użyty materiał został zwrócony
abortWarning.eng: By aborting this you won\'t receive any reward and the material used won\'t be returned

subtitle.trans: Join forces with other Netrunners to breach the SL-Data Fortress to grant all players a buff
subtitle.eng: Join forces with other Netrunners to breach the SL-Data Fortress to grant all players with buff

longPressBackToCity.trans: Długa prasa, aby wrócić do miasta
longPressBackToCity.eng: Long press to go back to city

des.trans: W Dungeons nie uzdrowisz po każdej walce, a wrogowie są silniejsi, ale jest więcej exp i łupów
des.eng: In dungeons, you will not heal after each fight, and enemies are stronger, but there are more exp and loots

noHealingPrompt.eng: Maybe buy some healing item first?

des.trans: Wygląda na to, że nie masz z tobą żadnego bólu, kup z Trinoky Mart w mieście przed wejściem do lochów, ponieważ nie regenerujesz po bitwach w Dungeon
des.eng: Seems like you dont have any Pain Away with you, purchase it from Trinoky Mart in the city first before entering dungeons, since you will not regen after battles in dungeon

des.trans: Dungeons są obecnie w trakcie konserwacji, Dexter pracuje nad przywróceniem ich jak najszybciej!
des.eng: Dungeons are currently under maintenance, Dexter is working on bringing them back as soon as possible!

equipmentBrokenMsg.trans: ${equipmentName} jest uszkodzony, napraw go w broni Smith w mieście
equipmentBrokenMsg.eng: ${equipmentName} is broken, repair it at the Weapon Smith in the City

noDungeon.eng: There is currently no public dungeon

showCanJoinOnly.eng: Only show dungeons I can join

desc.trans: Skanowanie dla pobliskich wrogów na ulicy, wrogowie na zewnątrz lochów są słabsze i łatwiejsze do pokonania. Jednak również spadają mniej exp
desc.eng: Scans for nearby enemies on the street, enemies outside dungeons are weaker and easier to defeat. However they also drop less exp

description.trans: Nie ma jeszcze żadnej społeczności do tego przedmiotu, bądź pierwszym, który stworzył jeden dla niego.
description.eng: There is no community lore for this item yet, be the first to create one for it.

description.trans: Otwórz Community Lore dla tego przedmiotu
description.eng: Open the community lore for this item

description.trans: Edytuj tę społeczność
description.eng: Edit this community lore

lowPrintLevelTip2.trans: Zwiększ swoją rangę drukowania, aby utworzyć potężniejszą broń, drukowając więcej pamięci podręcznych
lowPrintLevelTip2.eng: Increase your Printing Rank to create more powerful weapons by printing more caches

title.trans: Wybierz element użyteczny, aby wiązać się z szybkim gniazdem
title.eng: Select a usable item to bind to a quick slot

hasSpace.trans: Nazwa nie może zawierać spacji, możesz zastąpić przestrzeń za pomocą "_"
hasSpace.eng: Name cannot contain spaces, you may replace the space with "_"

tooShort.trans: Nazwa musi mieć co najmniej 4 znaki
tooShort.eng: Name must be at least 4 characters long

tooLong.trans: Name must be less than 16 characters long
tooLong.eng: Name must be less or equal to 16 characters long

invalidChar.trans: Nazwa może zawierać tylko angielskie litery, cyfry i "_"
invalidChar.eng: Name can only contain English letters, numbers and "_"

description.trans: Zwiększa maksymalne zdrowie
description.eng: Increases maximum health

description.trans: Zmniejsza obrażenia zaczerpnięte z wrogów
description.eng: Decreases damage taken from enemies

description.trans: Ilość zdrowia regenerowana po zakończeniu walki
description.eng: Amount of health regenerated after the end of combat

description.trans: Directly influences the amount of damage you deal
description.eng: Directly influences the amount of damage dealt by you

description.trans: Szansa na wykonanie krytycznego ataku
description.eng: Chance of you executing a critical attack

description.trans: Wpływać na krytyczne uszkodzenia ataku, które masz do czynienia wroga
description.eng: Influence the critical attack damage you deal to the enemy

description.trans: Zwiększa twoją pojemność tarczy
description.eng: Increases your shield capacity

description.trans: Szanse na ucieczkę od wroga lochu
description.eng: Chances of you escaping from a dungeon enemy

description.trans:
Chance of you stunning the enemy when dealing damage, 
    causing them to lose the ability to respond to your attack
description.eng:
Chance of you stunning your enemy when dealing damage, 
    causing them not able to respond to your attack

description.trans: Chance of you dodging an enemy's attack
description.eng: Chance of you dodging an enemies attack

description.trans: Influences the price when buying and selling from NPCs or stores.
description.eng: Influences the price when buying and selling from npc's or stores.

description.trans: Zwiększa pojemność zapasów
description.eng: Increases inventory capacity

description.trans: Increases damage by a percentage
description.eng: Increases damage by percentage

description.trans: Decreases damage received by a percentage
description.eng: Decreases damage received by percentage

description.trans: Decreases the chance of getting stunned
description.eng: Decreases chance of getting stunned

description.trans: Increases strength of shield by a percentage
description.eng: Increase strength of shield by percentage

description.trans: Zwiększa siłę twoich pięty
description.eng: Increases the potency of your heals

description.trans: Reduces time required to complete an AFK task
description.eng: Reduce AFK task required time

description.trans: Increases EXP you receive
description.eng: Increase EXP you receive

description.trans: Increases Bitcoins you receive
description.eng: Increase Bitcoins you receive

description.trans: Maksymalna zdolność zdrowotna
description.eng: Maximum health capacity

description.trans: Zmniejsza szansę destrukcyjnej awarii podczas kalibracji elementów
description.eng: Reduces chance of destructive failure when calibrating items

description.trans: Calibration failure will not destroy the item
description.eng: Calibration fails will not destroy the item

priceConfirm.trans: You are selling ${amountStr} ${itemName}(s) at the price of ${priceStr} Per Item
priceConfirm.eng: You are selling ${amountStr} ${itemName}(s), at the price of ${priceStr} Per Item

totalConfirm.trans: If all items are sold, you will earn ${total} Bitcoins
totalConfirm.eng: If all items are sold, you will earn ${total} BitCoins

sellAmountModalTitle.eng: How many would you like to sell?

title.eng: How many would you like to purchase?

subTitle.trans: Congratulations! You have leveled up your ${levelName}.
subTitle.eng: Congratulation, you have leveled up your ${levelName}!

title1.trans: I'm Dexter, the developer of this game, and I'd like to know your experience so far.
title1.eng: I'm Dexter, the developer of this game, and I hope to know your experience so far.

title2.eng: How many stars would you give?

title.trans: I am so sorry, please let me know where I can improve!
title.eng: I am so sorry, please let me know where I can improve

title1.trans: Wow, dzięki bardzo! Jestem zaszczycony, proszę uświadomić go, pozostawiając je na naszej stronie sklepu :)
title1.eng: Wow, thanks so much! I'm honored, please make it official by leaving them on our store page :)

title2.trans: Your good review is going to help me very much and bring more players into our community!
title2.eng: Your good review is going to help me much and bring more players into our community!

description.trans: Możesz przyczynić się do treści takich jak i wiele innych, edytując pliki konfiguracyjne na naszej stronie Github.
description.eng: You can contribute to content like this and many more too by editing the config files in our GitHub page.

subTitle.eng: Congratulation, you have leveled up your ${levelName}!

welcomeMsg.eng: Welcome to the best Text MMORPG

description.trans: Możesz zobaczyć pełny samouczek w profilu> Tutorial Tab
description.eng: You can see the full tutorial at Profile > Tutorial tab

title.trans: Zgadzam się zgodnie z poniższymi zasadami przed rozpoczęciem rozmowy
title.eng: Please agree to the rules below before start chatting

footer.trans: Zostaniesz wyciszony, jeśli naruszasz jakiekolwiek zasady
footer.eng: You will be MUTED if you breach any of the rules

footer2.trans: Pełna lista zasad można znaleźć w profilu> Tutorials> Reguły
footer2.eng: Full list of rules can be found in Profile > Tutorials > Rules

title.trans: Rozumiem i nigdy nie będę spamować ani nie złamać żadnych zasad czatu
title.eng: I understand and I will never spam or break any of the chat rules

description1.trans: Ponieważ ta gra jest wykonana tylko jedną osobą, bardzo trudno jest poprawnie przetłumaczyć wszystkie języki, ale pracuję nad dodaniem więcej tłumaczeń :)
description1.eng: As this game is made by only one person, it's very difficult translate all languages correctly, but I am working on adding more translations :)

description.trans: Możesz zmienić język w dowolnym miejscu na stronie Ustawienia
description.eng: You can change language anytime at the settings page

description.trans: Użyj nieoficyjnego tłumaczenia
description.eng: Use unofficial translation

description.trans: Kliknij polecenie Przeładuj, aby kontynuować
description.eng: Please click reload to continue

exampleText.trans: This is an example chat frame of ${tierName} Tier

requireGang.eng: Requires you to be in a gang

requireTopGang.trans: Requires you to be in the top gang
requireTopGang.eng: Requires you to be in the Top 2 Gangs on the Occupation Leaderboard

localCombatButton.trans: Kliknij tutaj, aby skanować wrogów ulicy
localCombatButton.eng: Click here to scan for street enemies

localCombat.trans:
you will receive exp, ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME} and loots when you defeat enemies,
                give it a try now!
localCombat.eng:
you will receive exp, ${Config.CURRENCY_NAME} and loots when you defeat enemies,
                give it a try now!

primaryAttack.eng: Click here to attack the enemy

statusInv.trans: Kliknij "Weź wszystko", aby uzyskać wszystkie łupki
statusInv.eng: Click 'TAKE ALL' to get all the loots

dungeonQuest.trans: Kliknij "Akceptuj quest", aby zaakceptować zadanie, możesz wypełnić lub porzucić zadanie w dowolnym momencie
dungeonQuest.eng: Click 'ACCEPT QUEST' to accept the quest, you may complete or abandon the quest at any time

localCombatTip.trans:
Otrzymasz exp, bitcoin i łupki, gdy pokonasz wrogów, 
                 spróbuj teraz!
localCombatTip.eng:
you will receive exp, Bitcoin and loots when you defeat enemies,
                give it a try now!

paypalBonusTitle.trans: All PayPal purchases grants 10% additional Units!
paypalBonusTitle.eng: All PayPal purchases grants 10% additional Units! You may use paypal only on website version, simply login with your browser.

paypalBonus.trans: Otrzymasz dodatkowe 10% więcej jednostek z zakupem PayPal
paypalBonus.eng: You will receive additional 10% more Units with paypal purchase

description.trans: Możesz także przyczynić się do odwiedzenia elementów, edytując plik konfiguracyjny na naszej stronie GitHub.
description.eng: You can contribute to the lore of items too by editing the config file in our GitHub page.

title.eng: Are you sure you want to discard?

warning.trans: Powyższe elementy / elementy zostaną odrzucone i nie być umieszczone w ekwipunku. Ta akcja jest nieodwracalna.
warning.eng: The item/items above will be discarded and not be placed into your inventory. This action is irreversible.

noSpace.trans: W twoim ekwipunku nie ma wystarczająco dużo miejsca za ${item}
noSpace.eng: There is no enough space in your inventory for ${item}

likeNotification.eng: ${likerName} has send you ${amount} respects for your skip

3.trans: Podstawowa ramka czatu (bez animacji i braku specjalnego koloru)
3.eng: Basic Chat Frame (no animation & no special color)

12.trans: Czy wspomniałem, że możesz być cybernetycznym ziemniakiem?
12.eng: Did I mention you could be a Cybernetic Potato?

newbieTip.trans: Nie uzdrowisz po każdej walce w Dungeon, pamiętaj, aby użyć swoich przedmiotów leczniczych.
newbieTip.eng: You will not heal after each fight in dungeon, remember to use your healing items.

content2.eng: I am Dexter, the developer of CyberCode Online.

content3.trans: Jeśli masz jakieś zapasowe zmiany, byłoby bardzo pomocne, gdybyś mógł przekazać, aby pomóc w dalszym wsparciu i rozwoju gry.
content3.eng: If you have some spare change it would be very helpful if you could donate to help with continued support and development of the game.

content4.trans: Proszę tylko przekazać, jeśli jesteś komfortowy, wszystkie korzyści są zaprojektowane tak, aby były uczciwe dla wszystkich graczy i nie dają krawędzi w rozgrywce.
content4.eng: Please only donate if you are comfortable, all benefits are designed to be fair for all players and will not give an edge in gameplay.

description.trans: Rozwiązaj uszkodzenia każdego wroga
description.eng: Deal damage to any enemy

description.trans: Nabyć bitcoiny w jakikolwiek sposób
description.eng: Acquire Bitcoins in any way

description.trans: Otrzymuj Exp z dowolnego źródła
description.eng: Receive exp from any source

description.trans: Zabijaj żadnego wroga
description.eng: Kill any enemy

description.trans: Użyj druku molekularnego, aby wydrukować dowolną pamięć podręczną elementu
description.eng: use molecular print to print any item cache

description.trans: Dołącz do lochu innego gracza
description.eng: Join other player's dungeon

description.trans: Wyczyść wyzwanie Dungeon (może być kooperowanie)
description.eng: Clear a challenge dungeon (can be co-op)

description.trans: Wyczyść dowolny Dungeon (może być spółdzielni)
description.eng: Clear any dungeon (can be co-op)

description.trans: Wyczyść dowolny Dungeon z 1 lub więcej graczami
description.eng: Clear any dungeon with 1 or more players

description.trans: Czat z innymi graczami, spam nie jest dozwolony
description.eng: Chat with other players, spam not allowed

description.trans: Otwarta skrzynia w lochu
description.eng: Open crate in dungeon

description.trans: Umieść przedmiot na rynku
description.eng: Place an item on the market

noEnoughSpace.trans: Nie masz miejsca w inwentarzu, aby kupić ten przedmiot
noEnoughSpace.eng: You have no space in your inventory to purchase this item

noEnoughMoney.trans: Nie masz wystarczającej ilości ${CURRENCY}, aby kupić ten przedmiot
noEnoughMoney.eng: You do not have enough ${CURRENCY} to purchase this item

title.eng: How many would you like to purchase?
